value:
$WmMPID_水着エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_Swim22,Face|Look at the sparkling waves! I had no
idea tropical waters were so clear.$k$pI can't wait to dive in and see what
else is underneath! What about you,
Seth? Lyon?$k$p$WmMPID_水着ゼト,ch08_02_Seth_M_Swim22,Face|I share your enthusiasm, Princess,
but I would hate for you come to
harm from some unforeseen danger.$k$pYour brother made it quite clear
I was to ensure your safety while
you are on this trip.$k$pI ask that you remain aware of your
surroundings. We must be wary of
shady goings-on that may be afoot.$k$p$WmMPID_水着リオン,ch08_12_Lyon_M_Swim22,Face|Oh? If it has you worried, there must
be serious risk... Perhaps I should
have prepared for this...$k$pWithout Ephraim here, it's up to us
to protect Eirika as if he were...$k$p$WmMPID_水着エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_Swim22,Face|Oh, Lyon. You need not worry so
much over my safety. We are here
on vacation, remember?$k$pBesides, I'm more than capable of
defending myself. Come on. Let's
dive in and enjoy the water!$k$p$WmMPID_水着リオン,ch08_12_Lyon_M_Swim22,Face|All right! No need to push! ...Urgh!
The sun here is...so bright! I hope
we brought enough sunscreen...$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_水着リオン,ch08_12_Lyon_M_Swim22,Face|Eirika swam so far already... Has she
even stopped to catch her breath?$k$p$WmMPID_水着ゼト,ch08_02_Seth_M_Swim22,Face|Will you be diving in after her, Prince
Lyon? Judging by her speed, if we do
not act, we will soon lose sight of her.$k$p$WmMPID_水着リオン,ch08_12_Lyon_M_Swim22,Face|I doubt I can swim that far at all,
much less stand a chance of catching
up to the princess...$k$p$WmMPID_水着ゼト,ch08_02_Seth_M_Swim22,Face|I see... Then if you'll excuse me,
I will trail some distance behind her
to ensure her safety.$k$p$WmMPID_水着リオン,ch08_12_Lyon_M_Swim22,Face|Of course. And while you do that,
I will...keep watch over the sand.$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_水着リオン,ch08_12_Lyon_M_Swim22,Face|Seth seems capable. I can understand
why Ephraim would entrust him with
Eirika's safety.$k$pI suppose that is one less thing
to worry about while I'm here.$k$pBut still...I had hoped I would be
of some help to her.$k$pIf I have nothing to offer in terms
of protection, what can I do? There
must be something, surely...$k$p$Sbs150|
